channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: WATCH: Medical pioneer goes viral at 93
item.description: An online video has gone viral showing 93-year-old Dr. Marshall Lindheimer, who has dementia, hearing about his groundbreaking research to treat and d...

item.title: Taiwan accuses China of "reckless" drills as forces simulate a blockade
item.description: As Taiwan blasts China's "highly provocative and reckless" blockade rehearsal, Trump touts his relationship with Xi Jinping and says an invasion is un...

item.title: "Bomb cyclone" hits Midwest, takes aim at East Coast. Maps show forecast.
item.description: A powerful winter storm system moving across the Great Lakes and Northeast is bringing snow and ice, frigid temperatures and fierce wind gusts.

item.title: George Clooney, his wife and their twins granted French citizenship
item.description: France's government says that George Clooney, his wife Amal and their eight-year-old twins Ella and Alexander have been awarded French citizenship.

item.title: WATCH: Medical pioneer goes viral at 93

item.title: Winter storm packing snow and strong winds to descend on Great Lakes and Northeast
item.description: A wild winter storm is bringing strong winds, heavy snow and frigid temperatures to the Great Lakes and Northeast.

item.title: Russian official threatens Zelenskyy as Moscow claims Kyiv attacked Putin residence
item.description: A top Russian official on Monday issued personal threats against Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy.

item.title: China's top diplomat blasts US arms sale to Taiwan as military drills unfold
item.description: Chinaâ€™s top diplomat has slammed a record U.S. military sale to Taiwan

item.title: Dutch angry at U.S. for yanking panels honoring Black World War II troops
item.description: The removal by a U.S. military cemetery in the Netherlands of two displays recognizing Black troops who fought in World War II has spurred anger there...

item.title: WATCH: 'It sounds like a dragon': Bear living under house won't leave
item.description: A homeowner in Altadena, California, says it's terrifying to have the bear live in the crawl space under his home.

item.title: 12/6: The Uplift

item.title: 2 New Jersey pilots killed in a helicopter collision frequented a cafe together near the crash site
Court releases transcript from closed hearing for man accused of killing Charlie Kirk
